Texto: 
gray-scale sonographic images demonstrate a cystic lesion within the anterior neck, midline, with a thin rim and increased through-transmission, with some internal midlevel echo consistent with debris, measuring approximately 1.1 x 0.6 x 1.2 cm.
thyroglossal duct cyst
thyroglossal duct cyst
thyroid lesion
abcess
4 year-old girl with anterior midline neck mass.
